data.name: Kanban Template
data.author: by Trello Engineering Team
data.description: A simple and visual workflow for engineering teams.

boards.name: Backlog
boards.description: Break down the roadmap by adding tasks as cards to the backlog list.

boards.name: Bugs
boards.description: Collecting the bugs in your appplication.

boards.name: Pending
boards.description: The tasks can not be done this this time.

boards.name: Todo
boards.description: When a card is fully specced out and designs are attached, move it todo for engineers to pick up.

boards.name: Doing
boards.description: Engineers move cards to doing and assign themselves to the cards, so the whole team stays informed of who is working on what.

boards.name: Review
boards.description: Cards then move through code review when they're ready for a second set of eyes. The team can set a List Limit (with the List Limit Power-up) on the number of cards in code review, as a visual indicator for when the team needs to prioritize reviews rather than picking up new work.

boards.name: Testing
boards.description: Once cards move through testing and eventually ship to production

boards.name: Done
boards.description: Move them to done and celebrate!
